relation: Share any unusual traditions or locations on campus
There is plenty of campus safety, do not worry..
The college book library is a fun place, with college themed hoodies, socks and t-shirts. Also pens,erasers,pencils,notebooks.
There is optional tutoring in any study.
There are arts and crafts, AP HONORS team, honors society.
There isn't really much of a good food service in the cafeteria. There are concession stands by almost every building entrance.
Henry ford has plenty of academic's to fulfill you're needs. Such as the school daily news paper for up-coming events, to class schedule accommodation.
If you're looking for serious instruction and guidance; HFCC is the place for that. HFCC ijust got a whole lot better in assertiveness and professionalism.

Well established and organized college as far as I have been attending. Great instructors who are willing to go the extra mile to help you individually. Good size library, with a withen walking distance class structures.
pageTitle: Henry Ford Community College Reviews: Student Reviews and Ratings | Cappex
TableContextTimeStampAfterTable: {111374=I love it. I've only gone there for two semesters over a year ago but I love the teachers. I'm currently enrolling in the Fall 2012 semester to finish my degree, 131046=Henry Ford is an excellent school with helpful and knowledgeable teachers. I have enjoyed the last 3 years I have spent there and look forward to the next 2 years I will spend in the nursing program. I expect to graduate with my RN in December 2013., 196382=© 2015, Cappex.com, LLC}

textAfterTable: In three sentences HFCC is overall a great school to attend. The professors are very helpful when it comes to getting the information you need as a student. I would say that HFCC is one of the best community colleges in Michigan. Login to rate or flag the reviews Jasmine from Detroit, MI 05/29/2012 Reviewer is A past student here. 2 out of 2 people found this review useful. 3 of 52 Categories Comments Campus Safety The campus is pretty safe and well lit. If something is going on or seems suspicious, the school will alert students. Also, campus safety will walk you to your car if you want them to. Great for these types of students Henry Ford has a lot of programs. It's a great school for: -Nursing & Other Health Related Careers -Computer Information Systems & Other Computer Related Careers -Graphic Design & Art Related Careers There are many more, but these are a few I know about.
